home.hero_description: ROWELL is dedicated to providing high-quality HPLC columns and consumables to customers worldwide, with competitive pricing and professional technical support, connecting brands and laboratories.
home.why_choose_subtitle: Our core advantages make your research more efficient
home.advantage_1_desc: Serving major research institutions, pharmaceutical companies, and testing laboratories across Americas, Middle East, and CIS regions
home.advantage_2_desc: Through our independent channels and procurement strategies, we offer prices 20-40% lower than manufacturers
home.advantage_3_desc: Over 10 years of HPLC industry experience, providing professional method development and USP standard reference
home.product_portfolio_subtitle: High-quality HPLC columns from global renowned brands
home.about_description: ROWELL's brand image conveys originality for the procurement of "rowellhplc" symbolizing the connection between brand manufacturers and laboratory customers through our unique knowledge and pathway that is not a simple trade of products, but laying out a pathway bridge of global resources.
home.about_milestone_1_title: Established in 2020, with the professional experience
home.about_milestone_3_title: Serving Asia, Americas, Middle East, and CIS regions
home.about_value_1_desc: Ensuring every HPLC column meets high-quality standards
home.about_value_2_desc: Serving worldwide with reliable logistics and technical support
home.about_value_3_desc: Leveraging 10 years in HPLC expertise for customer success
home.usp_subtitle: Professional USP standard matching for your analytical needs
home.testimonials_subtitle: Trusted by researchers and laboratories worldwide
home.testimonial_1_text: ROWELL has been our go-to supplier for HPLC columns. Their product quality is excellent, and the pricing is very competitive. The technical support team is always helpful in resolving analytical method issues. We especially appreciate their fast delivery and comprehensive product range.
home.testimonial_2_text: We work with ROWELL for our HPLC column needs. Their product quality is consistent, and they offer competitive pricing. The ordering process is straightforward, and their team is responsive to our inquiries. Overall, a reliable supplier for our routine testing needs.
home.testimonial_3_text: Working with ROWELL has been a great experience. Their HPLC columns perform reliably, and the technical support is excellent. The team is knowledgeable and always willing to help with method development. Their competitive pricing allows us to allocate more budget to other research areas.
home.contact_subtitle: Ready to place an order? Our team is here to help with any questions or inquiries.
